title: Hitesh
text: Experienced Blockchain developer, contributed to several IC ecosystem projects as full-stack developer. Currently working full-time for BOOM DAO and Plethora, enhancing web3 gaming development on ICP.

title: Jack
text: Experienced Game Designer who discovered a passion for blockchain technology. Now a dedicated Unity Developer for BOOM DAO and Plethora, embracing Web3 gaming innovation on ICP, one block at a time.

title: Ricardo
text: Elementum founder, building Bounty Rush and a Trading Card Game. Co-host of the 1st ICP Community Conference. ICP ES founder. Motoko dev.

title: Elementum
text: Elementum is dedicated to developing card games. Combining the best aspects of web3 and the traditional gaming world by focusing on UX and leveraging IC technology.

title: George
text: 2X startup founder executing on VR and Blockchain technology. Bullish on the New Immersive Creator Economy.

title: UnfoldVR
text: The Decentralized infrastructure for the new Immersive Creator Economy. A Digital Makers Space! Create And Discover interactive content!

title: Obsidian Tears
text: Obsidian Tears is a 2D RPG similar to the old time classics. Come build your hero with NFT items, spells, and more in a land of original art, music, and adventure.
